name: Syensqo (formerly Solvay) - Cerafy™ Biomimetic Ceramides
description: Syensqo (formerly Solvay) offers the Cerafy™ Range of Biomimetic Ceramides including Cerafy™ Pure NPo and pure biomimetic ceramide III (NP). Ideal solution to boost skin barrier function with biomimetic design that closely mimics natural skin ceramides. Premium barrier repair actives from global specialty chemicals leader.
notes: Cerafy™ Pure NPo is the first in the biomimetic ceramide range. Pure biomimetic ceramide III (NP) closely mimics natural skin ceramides. Ideal solution to boost skin barrier function. Global specialty chemicals leader ensures quality and technical support. Premium positioning for high-end formulations.
